item.title: 🛠️Flask Project
item.description: Getting Started with Flask: A Super Simple Guide for Beginners If you’re new to Python web development, Flask is the perfect place to start! It’s lightweight, beginner-friendly, and lets you build web apps quickly. Let’s walk through a very simple Flask project, explain every line in detail: 🔧 What is Flask? Flask is a small Python framework used to build websites and web applications. Lightweight and easy to use Fast to build and test Great for learning web development 🛠️ The Simplest Flask App (Hello World)
